nz.ac.massey.cs.ig.games.gomoku

Class GomokuBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.massey.cs.ig.games.gomoku.GomokuBoard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EasyGomokuBoard

    public class GomokuBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic implementation of an Gomoku board.

    Board structure

    This is a board with X*X fields, where X is 9 if not defined somehow else. Filed size must be odd number and less than 19 board looks like :
     -012345678
 0---------
 1---------
 2---------
 3---+o----
 4---o+----
 5---------
 6---------
 7---------
 8---------

    Field-Values

    • + stands for fields of Player 1
    • o stands for fields of Player 2

    Orientation

    • Y-Axis : vertical axis
    • X-Axis : horizontal axis
    Example : Field A (Y=2;X=5) would be: 
     -012345678
 0---------
 1---------
 2-----A---
 3---+o----
 4---o+----
 5---------
 6---------
 7---------
 8---------
    Author:
    Li Sui

        protected java.lang.String[][] getCurrentBoard()

            0     1     2     3     4     5     6     7     8
